meanings.definition: A plane figure with at least three straight sides and angles
meanings.sent1: I drew different polygons in my math class.
meanings.sent2: The playground was filled with colorful polygons.
meanings.sent3: The polygons on the paper seemed to be dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of intricate polygons.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece was a mosaic of various polygons.

meanings.definition: A closed plane figure bounded by straight sides
meanings.sent1: The garden had a beautiful flower bed in the shape of polygons.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed the different polygons of the city blocks.
meanings.sent3: The polygons on the quilt formed a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a fortress surrounded by impenetrable polygons.
meanings.sent5: The stained glass window was a kaleidoscope of colorful polygons.
